mapper.insert: INSERT INTO myCoursePlace (myCourseNo, placeNo, orderNo, writtenTime) VALUES (#{myCourseNo}, #{placeNo}, #{orderNo}, #{writtenTime})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS( SELECT mc.myCourseNo FROM myCoursePlace mcm JOIN myCourse mc ON mc.myCourseNo = mcm.myCourseNo WHERE mc.userNo = #{userNo} AND (mcm.placeNo = #{placeNo1} AND mcm.orderNo = #{orderNo1}) OR (mcm.placeNo = #{placeNo2} AND mcm.orderNo = #{orderNo2}) OR (mcm.placeNo = #{placeNo3} AND mcm.orderNo = #{orderNo3}) OR (mcm.placeNo = #{placeNo4} AND mcm.orderNo = #{orderNo4}) GROUP BY mc.myCourseNo HAVING COUNT(*) = 4 ) AS ischeck
SELECT m.userNo, m.placeNo, p.placeTitle, p.cat1, p.cat3, p.firstImage, p.firstImage2, p.mapx, p.mapy FROM myFavoritesUserPlace m JOIN place p ON m.placeNo = p.placeNo;
